channel.title: How do you allow to type in caps?
channel.description: Hey at least i posted n right section lol, does anyone know how to let yourself type in caps like I LIKE PIE. I know its client sided and i have my own client that i use so how would i go on about doing this?

item.title: How do you allow to type in caps?

item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

EDIT: sorry i kinda scimmed your thread =/

anyway if you have your own client then yes it’s possible, unfortiently I can’t help you, i’ve never coded a client but i do know its possible and i bet someone can help
